title: Mother Pikmin
summary: For a Bluesky drawing event to draw an OC or favourite character as a Pikmin. You can think of this as a reflection of her Noise form, which if she was allowed to have it reflect her true self, is more abstract rather than organic, one could say.

imgs.alt: Digital art of my OC, Mother, as a Pikmin. Her body is like a purple obsidian rock with a closed yellow and pink flower coming off her head. She's wearing her light blue suit jacket over her shoulders.

title: Would You Take My Hand?
summary:
A Glowing Spirit/Composer form of Carmen from Lobotomy Corporation, in a cross over like world with TWEWY where she becomes some sort of "fake Composer".

This was really interesting to play around with the Composer form! Thank you LeGaosaure for the Commission!

imgs.alt: Digital art of Carmen from Lobotomy Corporation in a glowing spirit-like form resembling the Composer's form from The World Ends With You. Her form is blurred and vaguely defined except for her face with an unsettling smile, and her hand extending to the viewer. Her aura has a more liquid, blood-like form, with diamond-like pupils embedded at the droplet-like edges.

title: Snacks! Nom Nom!
summary:
I just wanted to draw something with Super Puzzled Cat & Void Stranger cause they're both cool but kinda tough puzzle games that have latched onto my brain lately.

So here are the two protagonists are eating food stuffs!

imgs.alt: Digital art of the protagonists of Super Puzzled Cat and Gray from Void Stranger looking at each other and eating a snack. The SPC protagonist is standing on a pay print block, eating a blue fish and Lady Gray is standing on a white block turning to black and is eating a grey apple.
